about.summary: A collection of functions to visualize spatial data and models on top of static maps from various online sources (e.g Google Maps and Stamen Maps). It includes tools common to those tasks, including functions for geolocation and routing.

name: r-ggmap
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '3.0.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ggmap
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ggmap_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ggmap/ggmap_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 96c24ffdc0710d0633ac4721d599d2c06f43a29c59d1e85c94ff0af30dfdb58d

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rgooglemaps
    - r-bitops
    - r-digest
    - r-dplyr
    - r-ggplot2 >=2.2.0
    - r-glue
    - r-httr
    - r-jpeg
    - r-magrittr
    - r-plyr
    - r-png
    - r-purrr
    - r-rjson
    - r-scales
    - r-stringr
    - r-tibble
    - r-tidyr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rgooglemaps
    - r-bitops
    - r-digest
    - r-dplyr
    - r-ggplot2 >=2.2.0
    - r-glue
    - r-httr
    - r-jpeg
    - r-magrittr
    - r-plyr
    - r-png
    - r-purrr
    - r-rjson
    - r-scales
    - r-stringr
    - r-tibble
    - r-tidyr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ggmap')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ggmap')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/dkahle/ggmap
  license: GPL-2
  summary: A collection of functions to visualize spatial data and models on top of static maps
    from various online sources (e.g Google Maps and Stamen Maps). It includes tools
    common to those tasks, including functions for geolocation and routing.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - druvus

# Package: ggmap
# Version: 3.0.0
# Title: Spatial Visualization with ggplot2
# Description: A collection of functions to visualize spatial data and models on top of static maps from various online sources (e.g Google Maps and Stamen Maps). It includes tools common to those tasks, including functions for geolocation and routing.
# URL: https://github.com/dkahle/ggmap
# BugReports: https://github.com/dkahle/ggmap/issues
# Authors@R: c(person("David", "Kahle", email = "david.kahle@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre"), comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0002-9999-1558")), person("Hadley", "Wickham", email = "h.wickham@gmail.com", role = "aut", comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0003-4757-117X")), person("Scott", "Jackson", email = "scottmmjackson@gmail.com", role = "aut"), person("Mikko", "Korpela", email = "mvkorpel@iki.fi", role = "ctb"))
# Depends: R (>= 3.1.0), ggplot2 (>= 2.2.0)
# Imports: RgoogleMaps, png, plyr, rjson, jpeg, digest, scales, dplyr, bitops, grid, glue, httr, stringr, purrr, magrittr, tibble, tidyr
# Suggests: MASS, hexbin, testthat
# License: GPL-2
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.0
# Encoding: UTF-8
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-02-05 09:19:03 UTC; ligges
# Author: David Kahle [aut, cre] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0002-9999-1558>), Hadley Wickham [aut] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0003-4757-117X>), Scott Jackson [aut], Mikko Korpela [ctb]
# Maintainer: David Kahle <david.kahle@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-02-05 10:19:04
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
